title: Schema Changes
description:
Add three new fields to tick schema:
- requires: Pre-declared gate (approval|review|content) set at creation, persists through lifecycle
- awaiting: Current wait state (work|approval|input|review|content|escalation|checkpoint), transient
- verdict: Human response (approved|rejected), transient, triggers state processing

These fields implement the agent-human handoff state machine.
